deleteAllDialog.title: Delete All Challenge Trackers
deleteAllDialog.body: Are you sure you wish to delete all Challenge Trackers?

form.moveUpTooltip: Move the Challenge Tracker up the list
form.moveDownTooltip: Move the Challenge Tracker down the list

editForm.title: Title
editForm.titleTooltip: Set the title of the challenge tracker
editForm.sizeTooltip: Set the size of the challenge tracker in pixels
editForm.showTooltip: Show the challenge tracker to others
editForm.windowedTooltip: Display the challenge tracker in a window
editForm.outerTotalTooltip: Set the number of segments on the outer ring
editForm.outerCurrentTooltip: Set the number of current segments on the outer ring
editForm.outerColorTooltip: Set the hex color of the outer ring
editForm.outerBackgroundColorTooltip: Set the background hex color of the outer ring
editForm.innerTotalTooltip: Set the number of segments on the inner circle
editForm.innerCurrentTooltip: Set the number of current segments on the inner circle
editForm.innerColorTooltip: Set the hex color of the inner circle
editForm.innerBackgroundColorTooltip: Set the background hex color of the inner circle
editForm.frameWidthTooltip: Set the width of the frame
editForm.frameColorTooltip: Set the hex color of the frame

errors.notAllowed: Function '{function}' is not allowed for the user.
errors.notOwned: Challenge Tracker '{value}' is not owned by the user.
errors.notSupplied: Parameter '{parameter}' was not supplied to function '{function}'.

displayButton.name: Display Button
displayButton.hint: Display the Challenge Tracker button to users with this role and above (Requires reload)

buttonLocation.name: Button Location
buttonLocation.hint: Set the location of the Challenge Tracker button (Requires reload)

allowShow.name: Allow Show to Others
allowShow.hint: Allow users with this role (and above) to show Challenge Trackers to others (Requires reload)

outerBackgroundColor.name: Outer Background Color
outerBackgroundColor.hint: Set the default background color of the outer ring
outerBackgroundColor.label: Color Picker

outerColor.name: Outer Color
outerColor.hint: Set the default color of the outer ring
outerColor.label: Color Picker

innerBackgroundColor.name: Inner Background Color
innerBackgroundColor.hint: Set the default background color of the inner circle
innerBackgroundColor.label: Color Picker

innerColor.name: Inner Color
innerColor.hint: Set the default color of the inner circle
innerColor.label: Color Picker

frameColor.name: Frame Color
frameColor.hint: Set the default color of the frame
frameColor.label: Color Picker

frameWidth.name: Frame Width
frameWidth.hint: Set the width of the frame

size.name: Size
size.hint: Set the default size of the Challenge Tracker in pixels

windowed.name: Windowed
windowed.hint: Set the Challenge Tracker to windowed by default

scroll.name: Scroll
scroll.hint: Enable the scroll wheel for increasing/decreasing segments
